snippet.title: History of Science Bibliography
snippet.description: Histoire de l'Academie Royale des Sciences. QE 550-559 Earth Sciences Author. All of the included bibliographies were taken from the index view of the now obsolete telnet Luis. Thus, they are extremely brief and some information has been truncated. However, they will give an idea as to what is in Rare Books.
